name: fontsubset
description: Create a font subset from an existing font in SFNT (TrueType/OpenType), WOFF, or WOFF2 format. Uses harfbuzzjs, which is a WebAssembly build of HarfBuzz.
author: saurori, Jake G <106644+Jieiku@users.noreply.github.com>
